subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Christian Vande Velde of the Garmin-Transitions team dropped out of the Giro d’Italia with a serious injury for the second consecutive year.
snippet: Christian Vande Velde of the Garmin-Transitions team dropped out of the Giro d’Italia with a serious injury for the second consecutive year.
